description: The Dursleys mistreat and suppress Harry's magical abilities.
text: The Dursleys are unhappy with Harry's magical abilities {tuple_delimiter} They treat him poorly and try to suppress his magic. The Dursleys believe that having a wizard in the family is a matter of deepest shame{tuple_delimiter} Uncle Vernon has padlocked Harry’s owl, Hedwig, inside her cage, to stop her from carrying messages to anyone in the Wizarding world.

description: Harry misses Hogwarts and his magical life.
text: Harry misses Hogwarts and his magical life {tuple_delimiter} He misses the castle, his classes, the mail arriving by owl, eating banquets in the Great Hall, sleeping in his four-poster bed in the tower dormitory, visiting Hagrid, and Quidditch.

description: Dudley is a member of the Dursley family.
text: The Dursleys are obsessed with appearances and social status{tuple_delimiter} They put a lot of effort into making a good impression on the wealthy couple coming for dinner, even going so far as to rehearse compliments and Dudley's "hero essay."

description: Harry is different from his family members.
text: Harry is different from his family {tuple_delimiter} He has green eyes, black hair, and a lightning-shaped scar that sets him apart.

description: The Dursleys treat Harry poorly and neglect him on his birthday.
text: Harry feels lonely and neglected on his birthday {tuple_delimiter} He doesn't receive any cards or presents, and the Dursleys treat him poorly.  He misses his friends Ron and Hermione from Hogwarts, who haven't written to him all summer.

description: Dudley taunts Harry about his birthday and lack of friends.
text: Dudley taunts Harry about his birthday and lack of friends {tuple_delimiter} He mocks Harry for not having any cards and questions if he even has any friends at Hogwarts.

description: Harry considers using magic to cope with his loneliness and frustration.
text: Harry considers using magic to cope with his loneliness and frustration {tuple_delimiter} He thinks about setting the hedge on fire and uses nonsensical spells to intimidate Dudley.

description: Harry used magic on Dudley, resulting in punishment for Harry.
text: Harry is punished for using magic on Dudley {tuple_delimiter} He has to clean the entire garden as punishment while Dudley watches and eats ice cream.

description: Harry attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
text: Harry feels lonely and isolated at Hogwarts {tuple_delimiter}  He thinks about how his friends might not even know he exists, especially after being treated poorly by his family.
